content.title: Mukhyamantri Vriksharopan Protsahan Yojana
content.details: The scheme aims to promote tree plantation to conserve the environment and increase the income of farmers by providing financial incentives for successful plantations.
benefits: Farmers who plant trees instead of paddy will receive Rs. 10,000/- per year for 3 years for successful plantations.
Forest rights holders will also receive Rs. 10,000/- per acre per year for successful plantations.
Gram Panchayats and Joint Forest Management Committees will receive Rs. 10,000/- per acre for successful commercial plantations.
eligibility: Farmers of Chhattisgarh who sold paddy to the government after cultivating it in 2020.
Forest rights holders who sold paddy to the government and want to plant trees instead.
All Gram Panchayats and Joint Forest Management Committees wishing to plant trees on revenue land.
content.application_process: Offline. Farmers must register to be eligible for incentives. They need to fill out the appropriate application forms and submit them to the Chhattisgarh Forest Department Office.

faqs.question: What is the Mukhyamantri Vriksharopan Protsahan Yojana?
faqs.answer: It is a scheme aimed at conserving the environment and doubling the income of farmers by promoting tree plantation in the state.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Farmers receive Rs. 10,000/- per year for plantation in farms, forest/revenue forest/revenue land and commercial plantation.

faqs.question: Can people from other states also apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No. This scheme is only for residents of Chhattisgarh.

faqs.question: Who can avail the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Only residents of Chhattisgarh can take benefits of this scheme.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: Farmers of Chhattisgarh who sold paddy to the government after cultivating it in 2020, forest rights holders wanting to plant trees, and Gram Panchayats and Joint Forest Management Committees.

faqs.question: How to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Fill out the registration form and submit it to the Chhattisgarh Forest Department Office.

faqs.question: What are the required documents for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Aadhaar Card, Address proof, Income certificate, Mobile number, Bank passbook, Passport-size photo.
